In honor of his noodley goodness the Friendly Fire Bar will administer ice cold libations and groovin‚Äô tunes for your mind, body and spirit. Take a ride 3 stories up in the Sky Lounge and view the Playa with a much higher perspective. The Flying Spaghetti Monster welcomes all, so stop by and be touched by his noodly appendage.

name: Temple of the Indifferent: Chess Camp 2013
description: Temple of the Indifferent is back with Chess Camp III for 2013. New SHADE and THREE, count ‚Äôem, three chess sets for a three ring circus of chess. Returning favorites, 2007‚Äôs GREEN VS GREED and 2009‚Äôs SCIENCE VS SUPERSTITION and added to this year‚Äôs new camp, CARGO VS CHRISTIAN CULT.

name: Tender Heckles Porch
description: We brought the bullhorns and the instruments, you bring the sass. Come kick it on our porch!

name: Tennis Camp
description: The glory days of playing tennis on the Playa are back and have expanded with mini golf! Show up in your proper tennis whites or plaid golf pants to play a set and stick around for the country club soirees.

name: TEQUILA STOP
description: A tropical pit stop, where you can zip on fancy tequila or a straight shooter on the go! Always with Limon y Sal.

name: Terminal City:404 Village Not Found
description: Keeping burning man potentially lethal. Come for the hugs, stay for the abuse.

name: Termination Dust Hole
description: A collective of bands and fire dancers escape from the Arctic to fill your Hole by cramming it with live music, fire performances, Flunky Ball, and erotic sock puppets. Come chafe away the techNO at Termination Dust Hole.

name: The Academy of Arts and Sciences
description: Welcome to the Academy of Arts and Sciences. We have interactive classes teaching burners about science that can be used to create art, as well as art that makes science real. We strive to balance the left/right brain dichotomy with a range of activities to meet our fellow Burners‚Äô diverse tastes. Come visit!

name: The Anchorage
description: Step right up to The Anchorage and take a spin at the Wheel‚Ä¶ Of‚Ä¶ FORTUNE!  Discover your narrative direction and calibrate your moral compass while exploring a subtle twist on ancient arts of divination. Delve deep into your past, present, or future with insight from the beyond.

name: The Avant Yard
description: Avant Yard is a collective of artists and free spirits from all over the world. Through performance, healing, and self-expression our dream is to help the Burning Man Community evolve spiritually, physically, and emotionally.

name: The Black Rock Mafia
description: This looks like a nice neighborhood. We‚Äôre movin in. Nuthin happens without us knowin about it beforehand‚Ä¶ Capiche? You look worried‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt worry‚Ä¶ we‚Äôre gonna make you an offer you can‚Äôt refuse.

name: The Bouncy Bouncy Club
description: The Bouncy Bouncy Club ‚Äì Home of ‚ÄúThe Water Bar‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe Wilson Phillips Pancake Breakfast.‚Äù

name: The Breakfast Club
description: The Breakfast Club is Burning Man‚Äôs first radically inclusive breakfast village.  Formed from two pillars of the playa community, Pancake Playhouse and Scarbutts Cafe have joined forces to gift the most high octane, sticky sweet, soft rocking, spanktastic breakfast experience ever to seen in BRC. With support from the Airpusher Steampunk Airship our soft rock will inspire as never before. We‚Äôre a morning mecca of taste, stimulation and aural sensation for famished burners of all ages, types and experience l

name: The Bureau of Misinformation
description: The Bureau of Misinformation is Black Rock City‚Äôs leading source of radical ridiculosity, ambiguity, and factual inconsistency. We have the answers to all your burning questions, and you‚Äôre sure to leave as confounded as your are enlightened. We also have a pretty sweet bar, so if you don‚Äôt get the answer you want, at least we can drown your sorrows.

name: The Cats' Lounge
description: The Cats‚Äô Lounge is a congregation of like-minded, easy-going, feline-friendly friends looking to help new burners ‚Äúnewbies‚Äù find an identity by sharing clothing, makeup, and stories with the intention of setting them free into the abyss of the playa.

name: The Chai Tent
description: Come for Hot Chai between 9-10 every morning Monday to Friday.

name: The Dark Carnival Community Cafe
description: Darkroast for those dark of heart, the Circus is in town, Gothic performers lurking in the night. Bring your mug as we have no cups, embrace your inner expressionist but leave your drama at the door.

name: The Department of Experimentation and Research
The Dirty Beetles
description: The Dirty Beetles are a silly collective of artists, musicians, DJ‚Äôs and designers. This year for Burning Man 2013 we will be bringing our beloved art car for the 3rd year, called ‚ÄúBoogaloo‚Äù.

name: The Disco Space Shuttle
description: Confessions by day‚Ä¶.Join us in the ‚Äúmorning‚Äù for a tasty, refreshing, rejuvenating Bloody Mary ‚Äì confess a sin and be absolved by the power of the Bloody Mary! We provide the nutrients you need to go about your playa day. Reflections by night‚Ä¶.join us on the Disco Space Shuttle as we roam the playa with awesome beats and comfy chill, in our mirror-mosaic shuttle that‚Äôs about to take off‚Ä¶

name: The Dump
description: Where the worlds most fabulous musicians and dancers from MarchFourth Marching Band, Vagabond Opera, Trashcan Joe, The Libertine Belles, The Ukeladies, and The Saloon Ensemble are dumped and recycled to endlessly create music from a by-gone era. Come sing, dance, play our piano, and join-in as we all share electronic-free acoustic joy!

name: The Empress
description: Come to The Empress, the last bastion of a failed empire! Relive the glory of the Victorian age and enjoy the comforts of a more civilized time in our reinterpretation of a Victorian drawing room.Every afternoon our gracious hosts and hostesses serve you your selections from our tea menu along with light snacks(see the What Where When for daily times), as well as 24-hour self-serve tea (bring your own cup), and a nightime sheesha smoking lounge.

name: The Enchanted Forest Funk-i
description: The groovy magic of the redwoods and phungadelic beats are waiting for you! We‚Äôll be dancing and giving away free hugs 24/7, and if your timing is right, our Wizard has been perfecting his homebrew to quench your thirst! Our family is full of enchantment, each with our own talents to offer, bring your hOOp, your glow and fire toys, your cup, and that smile and we‚Äôd love to move with you!

name: The Future
description: Technological and social change offer the promise of a future that‚Äôs radically different from the present; what do we want that future to look like? The Future is a good place to meet people who think about that sort of thing, and even better, are doing something about it.http://future-camp.net.

name: The G-Spot
description: The G-Spot is a often hard to find and always pleasurable location in the warm (sometimes frigid) wonderful lower region of the Black Rock Desert, deep inside the fantasy zone known as Black Rock City where, you may discover an incredible welcoming environment. ‚ÄúThe G-Spot if You Can‚Äôt Find Us ‚Ä¶You Are Not Coming‚Äù!

name: The Gallavant Goddesses & their Lost Boys
description: The Gallavant Goddesses & their Lost Boys return with The Goddess Market. We brought what you forgot, from toothbrushes to tent poles, your own cup, bandanas, socks and everything in between!

name: The Gods' Vending Inc
description: Come and try your luck at the GODS VENDING INC! Open daily, except when the ‚ÄúOut of Order‚Äù sign is out. Insert an authentic Cargo Cult token, spin the dial and see what the GODS will gift to you!

name: The Grateful Man
description: We have joined our love of The Grateful Dead with our love of Burning Man <3 Put em together and you got yourself THE GRATEFUL MAN!!!

name: The Hive
description: A buzzing mass of madness from the East descends upon the desert, full of burning light and energy. Is the Hive full of honey, or stings? Bathe in our glow, and discover!

name: The Institute
description: Ah, the Institute‚Ä¶ of higher learning? higher earning? higher yearning?  Perhaps‚Ä¶or perhaps just a center for the study of the wide-spread, grievous affliction of bicoastal disorder. We‚Äôll never tell‚Äìwe merely guarantee round-the-clock experiments with the edges of art, technology, and movement.
hometown: New York, San Fransisco, Los Angeles

name: The Kazbah
description: CULTURAL COLLECTIVE OF FRIENDS FOR THE BETTERMENT OF ART, MUSIC, AND COMMUNITY.

name: The Last Resort Country Club
description: At the darkest edge of the Outer Ring, The Last Resort Country Club is a vision to weary adventurers brave enough to explore Black Rock City‚Äôs limits and newcomers approaching its distant lights. An oasis of comfort and civilization before the barren wilds open up behind us, The Last Resort is a place you can have a seat in the shade, sip a mai thai, take some tennis lessons and make some friends before you rocket away across the dust.

name: The Lemonade Stand
description: Join the Lemonade Stand for a fantastic daytime interactive art experience.

name: The Lollipop Guild
description: The Lollipop Guild returns to the Playa from over the rainbow to celebrate equal love in a garden of day glow lollipops. Join us to get married in our rainbow chapel, get your nails painted at our nail station, make your own lollipop art on our spin art bike, shine in black light splendor throughout the night and so much more.

name: The Lost Penguin
description: What could be more lost than a Penguin in the desert? Drop in at our hospitality oasis for shade, couches, wine, lemonade, chocolate, snow cones, friendly people and live entertainment. Join us for our iceberg obstacle course, get up on stage for asshole theatre, watch bands, dance to DJs or take a workshop. Or just sit and converse as you watch the playa float by.Hometown: San Francisco Bay Area & Toronto(We‚Äôre scattered globally, actually)URL: http://www.lostpenguincafe.comContact: thelostpenguins@yah

name: The Monkey Pit
description: The Monkey Pit is a Pirate themed interactive challenge camp where we award gifts to the winners AND losers of the many different challenging games for adults. Challenge the Monkeys of ‚ÄúMonkey Pit‚Äù if you dare. Maybe you can handle ‚ÄúThe Bilge adventure‚Äù? Or just have fun with Monkey Pawn, our version of what a Pawn Shop ‚Äúshould‚Äù be like. Activities are both day and night.

name: The Neighborhood
description: Come to The Neighborhood, where it‚Äôs Recess all day! Dance, drink and play your cares away. You can swing on our swings and slide down our slide, from our super dank bar, you simply can‚Äôt hide. Dance to some beats, no need to be discreet. We got your back covered from this whimsical heat. Do us a favor‚Ä¶Won‚Äôt you be our neighbor?

name: The Offering Bowl
description: When we thought to ourselves, ‚ÄúWhat is the greatest service we can offer to the world, and how can we do that through Burning Man?‚ÄùThis ensued:We want to feed everyone at Burning Man love-infused sacred gourmet vegan food.Volunteering is a generous gift of your time and allows us to feed more people ‚Äì even you!Can you think of a better reason to volunteer than the chance to give and get the best meal on the playa?

name: The Phage
description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth‚Äôs living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads ‚Äî the phage are the needles of life‚Äôs tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.

name: The Pongo Lounge
description: The Pongo Lounge is a casual posse of peeps dedicated to a low drama, stunningly psychedelic couch lounge complemented by visually appealing games, including some custom designed ping pong tables. Come for the comfy, come for the shade, come for the company, come for the gaming, come for the evening parties.

name: The Rising Arms
description: Your friendly, local watering hole and second home on the playa returns for a fourth year. Stop by to wet your whistle, just take care not to trip over the folks passed out on the floor, and if you want a quiet pint, be sure to pop in before sunset, after which it gets slightly raucous.

name: The Santopalato
description: The Santopalato strives to bring a magical, mysterious, gourmet and interactive dining experience to the citizens of Black Rock City, filled with art, laughter, and wonder.

name: The Space Between
description: At TSB we bring you the chill danceable grooves every sundown, 3 nights of awesome music sets as well as chilled iced coffee served from 2PM-4PM every day. We‚Äôll have sunrise milk and cookies and tea service on select days. See events for more info!

name: The Story Portal
description: The Story Portal aims to connect people to the vast world of shared experience through spontaneous storytelling. Jump into our story time machine to discover the story you are meant to share with our community!

name: The Sunset Trip
description: Take a journey down The Sunset Trip where 4 veteran camps join forces to represent the City of Angels on the playa. Hang out with us for the best live music and incredible DJs before  taking a tour on one of the 7 art cars: The Boogaloo Bus, Jabba Barge, and Charlie the Unicorn and friends.

name: The Temple of Anointment
description: Come join us at The Temple of Anointment to relax, heal and rejuvenate your playa ravaged hides with our handmade and organic lotions and potions. Bring a friend or meet a new one and lounge in our posh temple, give or receive some tenderness, and don‚Äôt forget to leave with a tube of Don‚Äôt Burn Man (or Woman) Organic SPF 32 sunscreen!

name: The Transmorphagon in the Sunset Trip
description: The Transmorphagon always has as many sides as it has‚Ä¶ and 2013 is no different.  As part of the Sunset Trip Village, we once again bring live music & a Killer vibe to your senses.

name: The Tribe
description: The Tribe‚Ä¶escaping you people since 1997! An eclectic group that defies any labels or descriptions, stop by and check us out!

name: The V-Spot
description: The V-SPoT is Burning Man‚Äôs official Volunteer Headquarters in Black Rock City. Where VCs, Managers and Staff come to seek Volunteers and where Burners come to find out how to help. Our friendly Volunteer Experts are here to answer your questions and help you find your ‚Äúspecial place‚Äù on the Playa. Volunteer needs change often; we work pre-event to post-event and have lots of ways for you to contribute!

name: The Virgin Defisles
description: The Virgin Defiles brings you Idaho CORE, Marvin. We will be hosting events throughout the week, including games, prizes, and food.

name: The Zebra Bar & Totem Bazaar
description: Come relax & enjoy a glass of wine in our zebra lounge. Dance the night away with our DJs. Bring,find or trade a totem in our bazaar.

name: Theme camp theme camp
description: A different theme everyday with tasty libations to match!

name: Theme of the Moment/Rat Camp
description: Ever-changing Themes reflecting our ever-changing city. Seduce and destroy!

name: Things That Swing
description: Including but never limited to: swings! hammocks! pendulums! people! We‚Äôve got a diverse Event Schedule, and we welcome you to step under our shade any time of day or enjoy our camp fire at night.

name: This Camp Is Bullshit
description: Bullshit! is the new awesome and this camp is full of it!  We are hosting Salsa Dance workshops/parties throughout the week; also stop by anytime to turn your bike into a raging bull so that you can stampede with us through the streets of Black Rock city during the 3rd annual Running of the Bulls, plus Asshole Karaoke, Ride the Bull Barrel, Wheel of Consequences and much more. So check the playa schedule, because This Camp is Bullshit!
hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco, New York

name: Thunder Gumbo
description: Lair of Thunder Gumbo, from the deepest, darkest depths of Brooklyn.http://www.facebook.com/groups/181205123028

name: Tiki Fuckos
description: Tiki Fuckos ‚Äì Your adventure party group!!

name: Tikiplex-12
description: Join the Cult of Film at Tikiplex-12, featuring 12 movies‚Ä¶ just not all at the same time. We‚Äôre a Tiki bar and movie theater in one; relax and sip sumptuous tropical libations at the bar as you enjoy eclectic, outre cult cinema classics in our not-quite-state-of-the-art projection system.

name: Time Colony
description: The Time Colony is a resource center for time travelers and the temporally dislocated. Visit us for information about The Year 2013, Time Travel Visas, etc., and to watch our Historical Preenactment!

name: TimeStop UFO
description: Inside of a giant glowing inflatable UFO will be a 24 camera Multi-Camera Array for creating light painting & strobe spinning portraits which will be projected for all to see.

name: Tissue and a Plan
description: Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don‚Äôt know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue. ‚ÄòCause all you really need is a tissue and a plan..

name: Titicaca
description: Happy people exploring the high altitude lake in the Andes mountains of South America‚Ä¶and some art cars‚Ä¶and some ice cream‚Ä¶and some frosty beverages!

name: ToneAge - FrumSanVanDencouver
description: ToneAge ‚Äì Frum SanVanDenCouver is a bunch of music loving, laid back,participants of all ages, 15-55, who came together on the playa by fortunate happenstance in 2007 and organized as a camp in 2008. We invite anyone and everyone to stop by and join us for a lemonade, some music, and some dancing.

name: Totem Wolf
description: Offering the Blackened, Grimm, Kvlt Brutality of the Northwest Mountain Region of DOOOOOOM.

name: Totenkitten
description: Totenkitten is a fascist demagoguery devoted to crushing all opposition and imposing our will on the masses; initially conceived as a reaction to the decadent weakness of other organizations, Totenkitten quickly took on a life of its own. If you can‚Äôt tell whether we‚Äôre serious about this, you should attend one of our propaganda seminars (bacon and beer will be served).

name: Trashistan
description: The Rant O Matic returns for your ranting pleasure. Located within Dr. Carl‚Äôs Department of Collections.

name: Tribal Thunder Drum Camp
description: Tribal Thunder is a participatory percussion playground. A gathering of like-minded spirits drumming, telling stories and creating a thunderous calling to the heavens. Make rhythmic thunder with the natives on 30-plus drums or have a swig at the Tribal Thunder Cantina.

name: Trifucta
description: This is the public page for camp Trifucta at Burning Man! Like this page to stay up to date with event‚Äôs and projects we are producing. We are a large community of friends looking to give back to our community through art and music )'(

name: Trinity Jump
description: Interactive craft camp to film, edit and print flipbooks in The Matrix bullet time style. Camp name refers to the Trinity‚Äôs fight sequence ~3 minutes into the first movie.And‚Ä¶Pilot a re-purposed Sentinel over the playa. Use the on-board systems to encounter and communicate with the denizens of Black Rock City. Embark on a mission of love, bewilderment, groove, propaganda, exploration, or create your own purpose in the playa skies.

name: Tripod Camp
description: Tripod Camp features a 14 foot high platform built like a tripod. Come get a bird‚Äôs eye view of the city!

name: Tropical Treehouse
description: A verdant home alive with the warmth of aloha!  Castaways welcomed to paddle up to the tiki lights and toast the night with a Mai Thai.

name: True Reflections Palace
description: Disco-Ver your true self in the amazing true image reflectors in the Disco Verium. You will not believe how much better your shining self looks when its not backwards!

name: Tsunami Bass Experience
description: Come experience multi-sensory bass culture appreciation at its finest as the Tsunami Bass Experience presents the ~WaVe~ installation in all it‚Äôs audio, visual and kinesthetic glory. Our low frequency transducing installation, commandeered by the finest bass masters on playa, will challenge your perceptions in an intimate, aficionado friendly atmosphere where collaboration and facilitation yield the optimal conditions for proper appreciation.

name: Tsunami Camp
description: Stop by Tsunami for a Playa Fashion Makeover, a frosty snow cone, or enjoy live music, spoken word, and general wackyness on our stage.

name: Twilight Spaghetti Theatre
description: This is your chance to show off your under-appreciated talents on our custom built stage for a spaghetti dinner! A Cappella Dubstep and Bad Decisions Jenga and constant heckling are also our specialties.

name: Twin Freaks
description: Twin Freaks, where you‚Äôll find mornings ushered in with a damn fine cup of coffee and pie that is nothing short of a miracle. Consult the talking log, seek solace from the searing heat, and help uncover new clues in the death of Laura Palmer. The owns are not what they seem.

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on playa, Unofficial Playa Civil Unions (incl. rings/certificate), Black Rock Temporary Divorce, Annulments, Spinning: interactive open room elwire sculpture with helixes revolving around 4 columns supporting a ceiling of whirling spirals and Joslyn‚Äôs Little House of Oral Delights

name: Two-Stroke Transit
description: Loud. Is that what you think when you hear the words two-stroke engine? Think again! Come on down to Two-Stroke Transit to find out how you can be a good citizen by muffling that annoying buzz of your two-stroke engine and prevent dripping oil while improving your engine‚Äôs performance.

name: UFOm
description: UFOm brings Extra-Foamal Communication to the Playa‚Ä¶ Bring an open mind and heart to overcome the government attempt to deny and suppress. Alien life can only be understood by those aware of the reality of being all one‚Ä¶

name: Uhuru
description: Uhuru has the voodoo for what you do.

name: Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves
description: O illustrious merchants of the flesh and pillagers of the wealth of man. Our glorious master, Uli Baba, he who is magnificent and just, he who rules with the wisdom of Soloman and the might of Saladin, commands your presence at his slave auctions, belly dance competition & workshops.

name: Ultimate Scientifical Celebration
description: You be the judge! Our elementary/middle/high school science fair operates Tuesday-Friday from 2pm until 4pm, tri-fold posters and all. Come prepared with your most skeptical lines of questioning to probe our methods, and be duly rewarded with fresh inferences and/or discussions of error. Also be sure to ask about the exact schedule of our nighttime mixer for anthropologists and tribespeople.

name: Unicorn League
description: Swarm with the unicorns at The Unicorn League. Reclaim your innocence in our ReVirginization Chamber to become unicorn bait and earn a piping hot UniCornDog!

name: Vagabonds & Tagalongs
description: At Vagabonds & Tagalongs, we strive to attract, include, and discover all the other miscreants and stragglers out there. We come from all corners of the US (and even Australia!), brought together by our love for radical expression and inclusion, with a little help from the wonderful world wide web.

name: Vamp Camp
description: Vamp Camp Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/groups/VampCamp/?fref=ts

name: Videogasm
description: Nightly video projection on our two big screens. Make a short video in 48 Hours and have it shown. Body painting, airbrushing and spray paint art every afternoon. Cool off in our misting tent, or try your luck at Giant Skittle Bowling. Come and play Playa Jeopardy on Wednesday Night. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday Night. Contact us if you have an original video you‚Äôd like to show. Located in Snowflake Village.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience (VICE Camp)
description: VICE Camp offers delicious Vietnamese Iced Coffee in a festive setting to quench your thirst and enliven your spirit.

name: Village of Sweet Perceptions
description: It‚Äôs all in the name: you enter, we erase and reprogram. Your outside views from the hallucinations of the default world will be changed by a process we call ‚Äúflip it and reverse it‚Äù. The processes is achieved by mind-melting, fractal lighting fixtures, large energy tapestries and tribal dance.

name: Virgin Hooper Camp
description: Are you embarrassed that you never learned how to hoop as a kid? We can teach (almost) anybody how to hula hoop in less than 10 minutes!

name: Volunteer Village
description: Roll up your sleeves, take a shot of Jameson and participate!Volunteer village is the home of VRT and a place to post your volunteer needs on Playa. Stop by and write on the job board, bring a drink to the bar and find people who like to get shit done!

name: Voodoo Shooting Gallery
description: Exercise your demons ‚Äì shoot voodoo dolls and shrunken heads to win glow cups emblazoned with Voodoo 2013 camp logo. Hosted by the best collection of French voodoo priestesses and their zombie slaves to cheer and award you prizes and treats.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: It‚Äôs a regular fucking hippie pow-wow down here at VBC. Bring your dream catchers, your magic crystals, and your hemp bracelets and get deep. Just kidding. Skateboarding, alcohol, and live rock and roll are what we specialize in; none of the aforementioned crap will be allowed.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: All VW Bus pilots landing on the Playa are invited to join us for our 16th Burn as we return, not expectantly waiting for cargo from John Frum, or even Larry Harvey, but to deliver and share fun with citizens of BRC. Camp‚Äôs Newbielandia newbie acculturation project, tie dye party, hooping extravaganzas, yoga, Leopard Lounge day spa and tiki bar, Playa famous vehicle repair, Burners Without Matches, live music, lectures on olive oil and original Buddhism will return!

name: Wanderer's Camp
description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, toxic tonic and Hot Dogs. Come by imbibe in our gifts and enjoy the shade, conversation and love.

name: Want It!
description: Do you WANT to know why we do this??‚Ä¶ . If you WANT to laugh and you WANT to dance‚Ä¶ If your intentions are good and your heart is pure‚Ä¶ then we WANT you here, with us.

name: Warp Zone
description: Warp Zone, purveyors of Aggressive Hospitality since 2010, are delighted to return home to Black Rock City for another beautiful year. Come and say hi, or stay and sit the long watches of the night with story and song in our new Hexahearth.

name: Wasabi Kisses
description: We‚Äôre a rad queer and trans* oriented bdsm playspace. Our goal is to create a space where sexuality and gender identity is respected and where queer, trans*, genderqueer, and gender variant folks can get their kink on with a focus on consent, safer spaces, and queer/trans* visibility.

name: We Come in Pieces
description: Come have fun and bounce around!

name: Wetspot
description: The WetSpot Bar & Faceplant Lounge: Welcome to the best place on the playa to enjoy a home crafted beer while relaxing in our unique lounge. WetSpot is about making new friends in an open to all setting while engaging in musings around one of our favorite pastimes: brewing beer. Our crew includes homebrewers and non-homebrewers alike and provides an inviting atmosphere to sample and learn about the art and science of brewing beer as well as just having fun.

name: What is this, Board Games for Giants?!? Camp
description: Come play with us! What is this, Board Games for Giants?!? Camp has created Twister for 50 people, giant Kerplunk, giant Lite Brite and giant Jenga for your amusement! Bonus points for those who get the reference, and for those with the best impression. Let‚Äôs play!

name: What Would Duct Tape Do? (WWDTD?)
description: What Would Duct Tape be Doing? Helping our community members keep their cargo in good repair! We will instruct and assist people on useful playa fixes using duct tape in innovative and creative ways to repair, strengthen and create! Spreading the gift of duct tape art!

name: Wheelie Camp
description: We are back and ready to Wheelie! We are Wheelie Camp and Whether it is a walking wheelie or a wheelie on a bike, we will show you how. Or just come by for a beverage and help us cheer all the other wheelie cool playa residents on. Pop a Wheelie in Black Rock City!

name: Where is the Dojo
description: ‚ÄúA place of the way‚Äù is the literal meaning of DOJO, which is anywhere, nowhere, and everywhere.If you‚Äôre looking for something but can‚Äôt quite find it, put your finger on it, or in it‚Ä¶. Well then it‚Äôs probably the DOJO!  At camp you can gaze among the stars, catch a glimpse of the Dance Ninja training, or a unique performance of ‚ÄúThe Desert Queen.‚Äù The Dojo is somewhere, everywhere, and nowhere, respect, honor, and appreciate the Dojo.  Namaste bitches.

name: Where's Stephen Slater? Camp
description: Howdy all you Playa Goers!!! Need a pick-me-up? We friendly TSA agents and cheerful flight attendants over here at Jet Blue Balls invite you to vent your spleen, take a ride down our emergency exit slide, and get a beer in the process!

name: Whisker Biscuit
description: Keeping with the last 2 years theme we‚Äôll be bringing it with a giant tripod for aerial acrobatic performances and workshops. Take a load off in the shade of our tea lounge and be prepared to be amazed! To step it up this year we‚Äôre debuting a flaming banana split art car‚Ä¶.stay tuned for more details.

name: Whiskey and Dust
description: We are a Whiskey camp with a small habitual yoga problem.Our concept is simple. Capitalize on what the Burning Man community desires more of (Yoga, Lyra performances, Juggling, and Hooping). At the same time, be challenging and creative to show the community something; anything that is new and different. www.whiskeyanddust.com

name: White Ocean
description: White Ocean is a new large scale art & sound camp at Burning Man 2013.  Creative, musical and artistic visions are coming together to wash over you with a warm embrace of sound and fire.

name: White Trash Oasis
description: Join the fight against MOOP! Leave no trace by using recycled materials to make your own moop pouch, pocket or holder. White Trash Oasis will bathe you with the sounds of the finest bluegrass music to ensure a rootin tootin good time while you craft!
